items.name: Component_ZoomAnimation
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_ZoomAnimation
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_ZoomAnimation extends gs.Component_Animation
    ###*
    * Executes a zoom-animation on a game-object.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_ZoomAnimation
    * @extends gs.Component_Animation
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (data) ->
        super
        
        ###*
        * The easing-object used for the animation.
        * @property easing
        * @type gs.Easing
        ###
        @easing = new gs.Easing(null, data?.easing)
        
    ###*
    * Serializes the zoom-animation into a data-bundle.
    *
    * @method toDataBundle
    ###
    toDataBundle: ->
        easing: @easing
        
    ###*
    * Updates the zoom-animation.
    *
    * @method update
    ###
    update: ->
        super
        
        if not @easing.isRunning then return
        
        @easing.updatePosition()
        @object.zoom.x = @easing.x
        @object.zoom.y = @easing.y
        
        if not @easing.isRunning
            @callback?(@object, this)
    
    ###*
    * Starts the zoom-animation.
    *
    * @method zoomTo
    * @param {number} x The x-axis zoom-factor.
    * @param {number} y The y-axis zoom-factor.
    * @param {number} duration The duration in frames.
    * @param {Object} easingType The easing-type.
    * @param {function} [callback] An optional callback called if blending is finished. 
    ###    
    start: (x, y, duration, easingType, callback) ->
        @callback = callback
        @easing.type = easingType || gs.Easings.EASE_LINEAR[gs.EasingTypes.EASE_IN]
        if duration == 0 or @isInstantSkip()
            @object.zoom.x = x
            @object.zoom.y = y
            @callback?(@object, this)
        else
            @easing.start(@object.zoom.x, @object.zoom.y, x, y, duration)

        
gs.Component_ZoomAnimation = Component_ZoomAnimation
